title: AIVA â€” AI Tool Review
description: AIVA is an AI music composer specializing in emotional soundtracks for games, films, and videos, with a focus on orchestral and classical styles. AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist) is an AI music composition tool focused on creating emotional, cinematic soundtracks. Unlike Suno which generates pop songs, AIVA specializes in orchestral, classical, and cinematic compositions. It allows users to guide the AI with style references and influence tracks. Used by game developers and film composers. Highlights: Specialized in cinematic/orchestral music. Style reference input. High-quality audio. Commercial licensing available. Long-form composition.
